util

Class FileInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.FileInfo
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DirInfo

    public class FileInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Exposes attributes for a given file on the file system.

      • getTotalLength

        @Nonnull
public java.math.BigInteger getTotalLength()
        Gets the total length of underlying picture file(s).
        Returns:
        length in bytes, null if neither a picture nor a directory containing pictures

      • reloadTotalLength

        protected void reloadTotalLength()
        Populates the _totalLength field. Should only be called once unless the file system changes.

      • getAvgDim

        @Nullable
public java.awt.Dimension getAvgDim()

        dimensions, null if neither a picture nor a directory containing pictures

      • getAvgCompression

        @Nullable
public java.lang.Double getAvgCompression()
        Gets the average compression rate of underlying picture file(s).
        Returns:
        compression rate in %, null if neither a picture nor a directory containing pictures

        protected void reloadAvgCompression()
        Populates the _avgCompression field. Should only be called once unless the file system changes.
